definition: to meet again/until we meet again/goodbye
again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: After a certain age, programmers rarely switch languages voluntarily.
sentences.chinese: 過了一定的年齡，程序員很少再會主動的更換語言了。

sentences.english: Mrrr? Very well, if you must. Fare you well, Walks the Night Alone.
sentences.chinese: 喵？好吧，如果你非走不可。再會囉，夜間獨行客。

sentences.english: Desdemona. Shall I deny you? no: farewell, my lord.
sentences.chinese: 苔絲狄蒙娜我會拒絕您的要求嗎？不。再會，我的主。
再會，2013科儀展，赫西離心機明年再來。

sentences.english: They plan on seeing each other again, whether in Paris or Istanbul.
sentences.chinese: 他們計劃在巴黎或伊斯坦布爾再會。

sentences.english: I hope I’ll meet up with many of you at the next stop.
sentences.chinese: 我希望在下一站再會你們當中的多位。

sentences.english: You miss himself since have been poisoned, who is good-bye Yi's believing him the person who puts poison in?
sentences.chinese: 你想他自己既已中毒，誰再會疑信他就是下毒的人？

sentences.english: That's what I thought. Adios, amigos .
sentences.chinese: 我就知道，再會了，朋友們。

sentences.english: GREensleeves now farewell, adieu, God I pray to prosper thee.
sentences.chinese: 別了，綠袖，再會，我祝願你幸福快樂。

sentences.english: I wish to say 'arrivederci' to Ancelotti.
sentences.chinese: 我想對安切洛蒂說‘再會’。

sentences.english: B: Thank you for your help. Good-bye.

definition: to see each other/to meet in person
to have no opportunity/no way (of doing sth)/no chance/no connection/not placed (in a competition)/(in pop lyrics) no chance of love, no place to be together etc
to agree (on a meeting place, date etc)/to reach agreement/to make an appointment
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
to leave (on a long journey)/to part from sb
